detaileddescription.para: Buffer metadata type that indicates a destination address. Metadata structs with this type ID must be of type GG_SocketAddressMetadata
Buffer metadata type that indicates a source address. Metadata structs with this type ID must be of type GG_SocketAddressMetadata

memberdef.argsstring: (const GG_SocketAddress *local_address, const GG_SocketAddress *remote_address, bool connect_to_remote, unsigned int max_datagram_size, GG_DatagramSocket **socket)
memberdef.name: GG_DatagramSocket_Create
